import React from 'react'; // ---------------------------------- The 'Favorite Vacation' Component Is Defined Here ---------------------------------- // export default function FavoriteVacationComponent (props: any) { return (

{props.vacation.vacationName}

{props.vacation.startDate}

-

{props.vacation.endDate}

{props.vacation.vacationPrice} $

{props.vacation.vacationDescription}
props.OnUserDislikeClick(props.vacation)}>

{props.vacation.followersCount}

) }
